```{r key-period-dispatch-plots-total-{{period.name}}, fig.width=figure.width, fig.height=figure.height, include=TRUE}
# Make plot if data exists for this region
if (length(gen.type.total[Period==p.name, value])>0 & sum(gen.type.total[Period==p.name, value])>0 ) {
  p = dispatch_plot(gen.type.total[Period==p.name, ], gen.load.total[Period==p.name, ])
} else{ p = 'Data does not exist for this period'}
print(p)
```
